gw.api.util.phone

Class GWPhoneNumberBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.util.phone.GWPhoneNumberBuilder

  • public class GWPhoneNumberBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This builder allows you to create GWPhoneNumber objects from scratch.

        The current builder object

      • withCountryCode

        public GWPhoneNumberBuilder withCountryCode(int countryCode)
        Adds the specified country code to the builder. This method will attempt to convert the integer to a PhoneCountryCode typekey. But will resolve it to Unknown (ZZ) if it's not successful.
        Parameters:
        countryCode -
        Returns:
        The current builder object

      • setCountryCode

        public void setCountryCode(PhoneCountryCode countryCode)
        Override's the builder's country code. There should be very few uses for this method.
        Parameters:
        countryCode -
        See Also:
        withCountryCode(typekey.PhoneCountryCode)
